items.sentence: Tom is the only one here who knows how to speak French.
Tom is the only one in our family who can speak French.
Tom is the only one who knows when we need to be there.
Tom is the only one who seems to know where Mary lives.
Tom says he doesn\'t remember seeing Mary at the party.
Tell us what you want and we\'ll try to get it for you.
That doesn\'t seem like the kind of thing Tom would do.
Was I supposed to buy something for you on my way home?
Tom boiled the well water so it would be safe to drink.
Tom came downstairs, so we stopped kissing immediately.
